project_description: A simple Flutter application demonstrating the Cubit pattern for state management. The app displays a text with an icon, and the text changes when clicked.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. State management is handled using the Cubit pattern, and the UI is built with reusable widgets.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. Sets up the app and provides necessary Cubits using BlocProvider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the root widget of the application.

files.name: lib/cubits/pet_cubit.dart
files.description: Cubit for managing the state of the pet text. Changes the text and icon when the text is clicked.

methods.name: togglePet
methods.description: Toggles the pet text and icon between Cat and Dog.

files.name: lib/models/pet_model.dart
files.description: Model representing the pet text and icon.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Main screen of the application displaying the pet text and icon. Uses PetTextWidget.

files.name: lib/widgets/pet_text_widget.dart
files.description: Widget displaying the pet text and icon. Changes the text and icon when clicked.

widgets.name: PetTextWidget
widgets.description: Widget displaying the pet text and icon. Changes the text and icon when clicked.

cubits.name: PetCubit
cubits.description: Cubit for managing the state of the pet text. Changes the text and icon when the text is clicked.

methods.name: togglePet
methods.description: Toggles the pet text and icon between Cat and Dog.

models.name: PetModel
models.description: Model representing the pet text and icon.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Flutter framework for building the UI.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant HomeScreen
participant PetCubit
participant PetTextWidget
User -> HomeScreen: open app
HomeScreen -> PetCubit: initialize
HomeScreen -> PetTextWidget: display
User -> PetTextWidget: click
PetTextWidget -> PetCubit: togglePet()
PetCubit -> PetTextWidget: update state
PetTextWidget -> HomeScreen: refresh
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the PetCubit, which is responsible for toggling the pet text and icon between Cat and Dog. The state flows from the PetCubit to the PetTextWidget, which rebuilds itself when the state changes.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen, HomeScreen, which is displayed when the app is opened. No additional navigation is required.
